item.title: Kubernetes Operator
item.description: Operator Operator is equivalent for Custom Resource definations (crds) with Custom Resource Controller (crc) Custom Resources A resource is an endpoint in the Kubernetes API that stores a collection of API objects of a certain kind; for example, the built-in pods resource contains a collection of Pod objects. A custom resource is an extension of the Kubernetes API that is not necessarily available in a default Kubernetes installation. It represents a customization of a particular Kubernetes installation.
